name: A Very Dizzy Christmas Remaster
description:
A Very Dizzy Christmas is a Dizzy fan game created by auld games (Scottigesoft) in 2003. My remaster recodes the game from scratch to address some issues I had with the original as well as add extra features.

In 2019 I started the project in MultiMediaFusion2. Unfortunately, that program was missing some essential features and as a result, I switched to Godot Engine.

After 3 years of collective work, the project was finished.

Extra features:

-Language selection

-Slot Save system

-Difficulty selection

-Region based scrolling

-Option menu to choose your options

-Change Keyboard inputs

-Nintendo online like Time rewind.

Have a Very Dizzy Christmas, everyone!
